trans-unit.source: Container for all extended editor logic for properties.
trans-unit.target: Contêiner para toda a lógica de editor estendido para as propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The ExtendedPropertyValueEditor class can hold two <xref:System.DataTemplate> objects, one for an inline editor and one for an extended editor.
trans-unit.target: A classe ExtendedPropertyValueEditor pode conter dois <xref:System.DataTemplate>objetos, um para um editor embutido e um para um editor estendido.</xref:System.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The inline editor provides a custom interface that appears within the bounds of the `Properties` window, and the extended editor provides an interface that appears in a new window.
trans-unit.target: Os editores fornece uma interface personalizada que é exibida dentro dos limites do `Properties` janela e o editor estendido fornece uma interface que aparece em uma nova janela.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the visual interface for the inline editor, and the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the extended editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A>propriedade retorna o modelo XAML para a interface visual para o editor embutido e o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A>propriedade retorna o modelo XAML para o editor estendido.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: These are typically provided in a ResourceDictionary elsewhere in the project.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, eles são fornecidos em um dicionário de recurso em outro lugar no projeto.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> to invoke your custom ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton>para invocar o ExtendedPropertyValueEditor personalizado.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor"></xref> class without specified extended and inline editor <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor"> </xref> classe sem especificada estendida e editores <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor"></xref> with the specified extended and inline editor <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor"> </xref> com especificado estendido e editores <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: When used, its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> usado para o pop-up estendido ou fixado editor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used for the inline editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> usado para o editor embutido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> usado para o pop-up estendido ou fixado editor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> object used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> objeto usado para o editor estendido de pop-up ou fixo.
